title: Online Engineering Learning Environment Design: Learner-Centered Mathematics Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level knowledge in engineering and mathematics
context.additional_context: Requirement for smartphone-based accessibility-optimized learning environments for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners will apply at least three mathematical modeling techniques for engineering problem-solving
Learners will access desired content within 5 seconds when navigating learning materials on a mobile-optimized LMS interface
Learners will integrate mathematical theories into real-world engineering cases and submit project-based assessment reports

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
